page.title: 09Recreational Activities
page.content: Older Young People tend to join the Young Farmers Club.This is a mixed club and as its name suggests is primarily for young farmers. This group meets twice a month usually in the school during the winter but outside at farms and other places of interest during the summer following activities such as stock judging etc. During the winter they have visiting speakers and demonstrators and hold quizes and public speaking competitions etc. The district is served by four local pubs, only one is in our rectangle but these play quite a major part in village life having men and ladies darts teams, leek clubs, domino competitions and darts matches.Most of them also provide bar meals at a reasonable price.
